teal.render.j3d

Class WeightedPendulumNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.media.j3d.SceneGraphObject
      • javax.media.j3d.Node
        • javax.media.j3d.Group
          • javax.media.j3d.BranchGroup
            • teal.render.j3d.Node3D
              • teal.render.j3d.WeightedPendulumNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasBoundingArea, HasPosition, HasRotation, HasTransform, IsPickable, TNode, TNode3D, TSceneObject

    public class WeightedPendulumNode
extends Node3D
    This is the node for the WeightedPhysicalPendulum PhysicalObject. It contains methods for rendering the the pendulum itself, and the disc-shaped weight attached to it.
